sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-scrollbar wrap-class="scrollbar-wrapper">
    <el-menu :show-timeout="200" :default-active="$route.path" :collapse="isCollapse"
      mode="vertical" background-color="#304156" text-color="#bfcbd9" active-text-color="#409EFF">
      <sidebar-item v-for="route in permission_routers" :key="route.path" :item="route"
        :base-path="route.path" />
    </el-menu>
  </el-scrollbar>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from "vuex";
import SidebarItem from "./SidebarItem";

export default {
  components: { SidebarItem },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters(["permission_routers", "sidebar"]),
    isCollapse() {
      return !this.sidebar.opened;
    },
    perms(){
      return this.$store.getters.perms;
    }
  },
};
</script>
